PyTravLITE Guide¶

What began as a DOS prompt NPC generator escalated into a web-browsed one…

PyTravLITE is an easy-to-use open source NPC generator for Mongoose Traveller 1st and 2nd Editions. It’s written in Python 3.9.7 and includes PyDiceroll 3.4 for its die rolling. Source for PyDiceroll 3.4 can be found at its GitHub repository.

PyTravLITE features minor logging and error tracking at this time.

This documentation explains how to install and use PyTravLITE for Traveller NPC generation.
